com.sneakyrocket.pocketrocket.v1.core

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sneakyrocket.pocketrocket.v1.core.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    The controlling interface between the UI and the server connection.
    Author:
    Jordan Crawford, Andrew Williamson

    • Constructor Detail

      • Session

        public Session(Server target)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Given a Server, creates a session by connecting and sending the hello message. The port provided in the response to the hello message is used for any subsequent connections.
        Parameters:
        target -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runScript

        public java.io.BufferedReader runScript(Script script)
        Runs a script, providing the BufferedReader of the script. Returns the BufferedReader before the script has finished running, allowing UI threads to display the output in real time.
        Parameters:
        script -
        Returns:
